Build pretty barplots fast — ppp_barplot
text: function produce barplots using ggplot2 theme, colors, text

title: Build pretty barplots fast — ppp_barplot
text: data data frame x_var categorical variable data colors character vector colors names x_var

title: Build pretty barplots fast — ppp_barplot
text: pretty colored barplot counts printed plot

title: Build pretty barplots fast — ppp_barplot
code: my_colors <- c("#337495", "#002a33", "#2f5a69", "#143b44") ppp_barplot(data = dplyr::starwars, x_var = "sex", colors = my_colors) #> Warning: The dot-dot notation (`..count..`) was deprecated in ggplot2 3.4.0. #> ℹ Please use `after_stat(count)` instead. #> ℹ The deprecated feature was likely used in the courseproject package. #>   Please report the issue to the authors.

title: Build pretty boxplots fast — ppp_boxplot
text: function produce boxplots using ggplot2 theme, colors, statistics

title: Build pretty boxplots fast — ppp_boxplot
code: ppp_boxplot(data, x_var, y_var, comparisons, colors, method)

title: Build pretty boxplots fast — ppp_boxplot
text: data data frame x_var categorical variable data y_var numeric variable data comparisons list groups compare colors character vector colors names x_var method statistical method

title: Build pretty boxplots fast — ppp_boxplot
text: pretty colored boxplot stats printed plot

title: Build pretty boxplots fast — ppp_boxplot
code: my_comparisons <- list(c("female", "hermaphroditic"), c("female", "male"), c("female", "none")) my_colors <- c("#337495", "#002a33", "#2f5a69", "#143b44") my_method <- "wilcox.test" ppp_boxplot(data = dplyr::starwars,             x_var = "sex",              y_var = "height",              comparisons = my_comparisons,              colors = my_colors,              method = my_method) #> Warning: Removed 6 rows containing non-finite outside the scale range #> (`stat_boxplot()`). #> Warning: Removed 6 rows containing non-finite outside the scale range (`stat_signif()`). #> Warning: cannot compute exact p-value with ties #> Warning: cannot compute exact p-value with ties #> Warning: Removed 6 rows containing missing values or values outside the scale range #> (`geom_point()`).
